member.name: ITrackShellMenu.Popup
member.summary: Displays a modal pop-up menu at a specific location.
member.param: The handle of the parent window of the pop-up menu.
A pointer to a structure that specifies an initial point in screen coordinates. The pop-up menu is displayed in relation to this point as determined by the position flags set in dwFlags.

A pointer to a structure that specifies the rectangle to exclude when positioning the menu. The alignment of the menu in relation to this area is determined by the alignment flags set in dwFlags. This parameter can be set to NULL.
One or more of the MP_POPUPFLAGS constants that specify options involved in the display of the pop-up menu.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ITrackShellMenu.SetObscured
member.summary: Coordinates obscured items on a toolbar with items in a menu.
member.param: A handle to a toolbar control whose buttons have command IDs that correspond to menu IDs in the tracked menu.

param.name: punkBand
param.para: If this parameter points to a COM object that supports the interface, menu items that correspond to visible toolbar buttons are filtered out of the menu so that they do not appear in both places.

If this parameter is NULL or points to a COM object that does not support the interface, then the obscured buttons in the toolbar are added to the shell menu in the position specified in dwSMSetFlags.

param.name: dwSMSetFlags
param.para: New menu items are added at the top of the menu.
New menu items are added at the bottom of the menu.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ITrackShellMenu
member.summary: Exposes methods that extend the interface by providing the ability to coordinate toolbar buttons with a menu as well as display a pop-up menu.
